vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the replacement and rehabilitation of water and wastewater mains for the Hickory Creek Phase 2A Project (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Douglas Dailey Construction, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of four - Not to exceed $12,538,800.00 - Financing: Water Construction Fund ($61,700.00), 2022C Water Revenue Bonds TWDB LM221535 Fund ($4,785,780.00), Wastewater Capital Improvement G Fund ($2,990,642.67), and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($4,700,677.33)
vote.description: Authorize a construction services contract for the replacement and rehabilitation of water and wastewater mains for the Hickory Creek Phase 2A Project (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Douglas Dailey Construction, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of four - Not to exceed $12,538,800.00 - Financing: Water Construction Fund ($61,700.00), 2022C Water Revenue Bonds TWDB LM221535 Fund ($4,785,780.00), Wastewater Capital Improvement G Fund ($2,990,642.67), and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($4,700,677.33)
